leadership.title: Seasons of Code Mentor
leadership.organization: Web and Coding Club, IIT Bombay
responsibilities: Mentored 10+ students on Intrusion Detection Systems alongside two colleagues
Guided students in monitoring network traffic and capturing packets using Scapy
Taught traffic pattern analysis and detection of suspicious behavior with Wireshark
Integrated machine learning algorithms (Decision Trees & KNN) into NIDS for practical projects
leadership.impact: Successfully trained students to implement functional ML-enhanced intrusion detection systems

leadership.title: Finsearch Mentor
responsibilities: Mentored 12+ students in evaluating and enhancing bond valuation methods
Guided students on bond fundamentals, valuation approaches, and key influencing factors
Conducted practical assessments and addressed common limitations in bond valuation
leadership.impact: Enhanced students' ability to perform critical financial analyses and valuations

extracurricular.details: Underwent rigorous year-long NCC training, developing discipline and teamwork skills
Participated in a year-long cricket program to enhance sportsmanship and teamwork
Volunteered for environmental cleanup initiatives demonstrating civic responsibility
Part of the team that secured third place in the tournament
Represented hostel in marathon, showcasing endurance and team spirit
Competed actively as part of the hostel team at Institute GC
